overview: Dr. Stephanie Dalley hunts for the mythical Hanging Garden of Babylon, one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World, using ancient texts and spy satellite images to uncover evidence to support her theory that the gardens were built 100 years before commonly believed. Her search takes her to one of the most dangerous places on earth in a modern-day adventure to find a site thousands of years old.
title: The Lost Gardens of Babylon
